Gets publishable representations for an application

parameters.description: Representation IDs to publish, and user performing action

patch.description: Redact a representation for an application

parameters.name: body
parameters.description:
Representation redact details 
 type can be REDACT_STATUS or REDACT. If REDACT_STATUS then redactedRepresentation is not a mandatory field but redactStatus will be.

delete.description: Delete a representation attachment for an application document

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Status body to update a rep stats and create a rep action

post.description: Create or update the document version metadata for a document

parameters.description: guid of the required document here

200.description: The metadata has been successfully stored.
